segments.text: I feel so bad for the woman because she’s going to have a big mess to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she doesn’t even see it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are taking advantage of her distraction, and it’s just not fair.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and the girl is just encouraging him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would walk in and help her before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting ruined, and she’s still just drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand seeing her like this, so unaware of everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are going to get in trouble, and she’s going to be so upset when she realizes what happened.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope no one gets hurt in all of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a sad scene because no one is paying attention to what really matters.
segments.speaker: PAR
